org.mixare.lib.gui

Class ScreenLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mixare.lib.gui.ScreenLine

  • public class ScreenLine
extends java.lang.Object
    The class stores a point of a two-dimensional coordinate system. (values of the x and y axis)
